shortTestimonial: We are now excited owners of several beautiful paintings and look forward to seeing what new pieces are added to the gallery.  Working with Jerry and Joan was a great experience.
longTestimonial: Being new to the world of 19th century art, Jerry and Joan patiently provided background on the artists and their works and encouraged us to focus on pieces that speak to us.  We are now excited owners of several beautiful paintings and look forward to seeing what new pieces are added to the gallery.  Working with Jerry and Joan was a great experience.
name: Patty and Jim K.
